meanings.definition: Departing from the main subject or course
meanings.sent1: Her digressionary stories often made the class lose focus.
meanings.sent2: The digressionary speech went off topic multiple times.
meanings.sent3: His digressionary jokes lightened the mood in the room.
meanings.sent4: The digressionary path led us through unexpected adventures.
meanings.sent5: The digressionary nature of his storytelling was captivating.

meanings.sent1: The digressionary nature of the book made it hard to follow.
meanings.sent2: Her digressionary writing style added depth to the narrative.
meanings.sent3: The digressionary plot twists kept the readers on their toes.
meanings.sent4: His digressionary thoughts wandered into uncharted territories.
meanings.sent5: The digressionary approach to problem-solving was unconventional.
